ERRORS.v1: Sorry, I can't understand the command. Please say again.
ERRORS.v2: Sorry, I didn't get that. Could you say it again?.

HELP.MESSAGE: This is the Alexa Skill for rocket chat. If you do not have the code, please go to Rocket Chat web client , and click on your avatar at the top left and select My Account. Then register with Alexa to get the six digits code.

WELCOME.SUCCESS: Welcome To Rocket Chat Alexa Skill. What Would you like to do today?
WELCOME.NO_SERVER_FOUND: Welcome To Rocket Chat Alexa Skill. Currently, You don't have any registered server on this skill. Please say , Add Server , if you have a pincode , or , Help If you want to know how to generate one.
WELCOME.SUCCESS_RETURN_USER: Welcome back! What Would you like to do today?
WELCOME.ERROR: To start using this skill, please use the companion app to authenticate.

CREATE_CHANNEL.AUTH_ERROR: Sorry you are currently signed out , please use the companion app to authenticate
CREATE_CHANNEL.ERROR: Sorry, I couldn't create the channel {channelName} right now.
CREATE_CHANNEL.ERROR_DUPLICATE_NAME: Sorry, the channel {channelName} already exists. Please try again with different channel name.
CREATE_CHANNEL.ERROR_INVALID_NAME: Sorry, {channelName} is not a valid channel name. Please try again with a single word name for the channel.

DELETE_CHANNEL.AUTH_ERROR: Sorry you are currently signed out , please use the companion app to authenticate
DELETE_CHANNEL.ERROR: Sorry, I couldn't delete the channel {channelName} right now.
DELETE_CHANNEL.ERROR_NOT_FOUND: Sorry, the channel {channelName} does not exist. Please try again with different channel name.

POST_MESSAGE.ASK_MORE: Would you like to add more?
POST_MESSAGE.AUTH_ERROR: Sorry you are currently signed out , please use the companion app to authenticate
POST_MESSAGE.ERROR: Sorry, I couldn't send your message right now.

ADD_ALL_TO_CHANNEL.AUTH_ERROR: Sorry you are currently signed out , please use the companion app to authenticate
ADD_ALL_TO_CHANNEL.ERROR: Sorry, I am unable to add all users to the channel right now.
ADD_ALL_TO_CHANNEL.ERROR_NOT_FOUND: Sorry, I am unable to add all users to channel {channelName} right now.

SERVER.ERROR: Sorry I cannot find any server related to this pincode
SERVER.SWAP_ERROR: Sorry I cannot find server {servername}. Please Try again with different servername.

GET_LAST_MESSAGE_FROM_CHANNEL.AUTH_ERROR: Sorry you are currently signed out , please use the companion app to authenticate
GET_LAST_MESSAGE_FROM_CHANNEL.ERROR: Sorry, I couldn't find the channel {channelName} right now.
GET_LAST_MESSAGE_FROM_CHANNEL.ERROR_NOT_FOUND: Sorry, the channel {channelName} does not exist. Please try again with different channel name.

GET_UNREAD_MESSAGES_FROM_CHANNEL.MESSAGE: You Have {unread} Unread Messages <break time='1s'/> {respString} <break time='0.7s'/>

GET_UNREAD_MESSAGES_FROM_CHANNEL.NO_MESSAGE: You Don't Have Any Unread Messages.
GET_UNREAD_MESSAGES_FROM_CHANNEL.ERROR: Sorry, I couldn't find the channel {channelName} right now.
GET_UNREAD_MESSAGES_FROM_CHANNEL.ERROR_NOT_FOUND: Sorry, the channel {channelName} does not exist. Please try again with different channel name.

MAKE_MODERATOR.AUTH_ERROR: Sorry you are currently signed out , please use the companion app to authenticate
MAKE_MODERATOR.ERROR: Sorry, I couldn't assign a moderator right now.
MAKE_MODERATOR.ERROR_NOT_FOUND: Sorry, I couldn't assign a moderator to {channelName} right now.

ADD_OWNER.AUTH_ERROR: Sorry you are currently signed out , please use the companion app to authenticate
ADD_OWNER.ERROR: Sorry, I couldn't assign a owner to the channel right now.
ADD_OWNER.ERROR_NOT_FOUND: Sorry, I couldn't assign a owner to channel {channelName} right now.

ARCHIVE_CHANNEL.AUTH_ERROR: Sorry you are currently signed out , please use the companion app to authenticate
